title: GMFB: Week 1 Hype Train
itunes:title: GMFB: Week 1 Hype Train
description:
On the #GMFB Podcast: The group shared who and what they are excited about in Week 1: Nate on Browns rookie QB DeShone Kizer (1:45), Kyle on Giants WR Odell Beckham Jr. (6:22), Peter on JJ Watt’s return to the field (7:49), Nate on the quarterbacks in front of rookies (8:57), and Kay on Cam Newton (12:48); The team talks about fun Twitter interactions from the show (17:10) and previews their upcoming trip to NFL Films (19:13); Buffalo Bills Center Eric Wood joins the show (20:11) and finally, the group shares their dream guests (26:38)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
